channel.title: Disconnection/Crash when Equipment tabbed is clicked
channel.description:
The client seems to crash when I press the Equipment tab when I use Moparscapes client/webclient. No error message shows up on the run batch file when the client crashes, and nothing comes up on the web client.
I used the 4.1 Webclient and got an error message though:
Exception in thread "Thread-15" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 64992 at rs.config.ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:190) at rs.config.ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:240) at rs.client.drawInterface(client.java:6948) at rs.client.drawTabArea(client.java:1442) at rs.client.drawGameScreen(client.java:6707) at rs.client.processDrawing(client.java:7439) at rs.RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:103) at rs.client.run(client.java:3869) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Any help is appreciated, thank you.

item.title: Disconnection/Crash when Equipment tabbed is clicked

The client seems to crash when I press the Equipment tab when I use Moparscapes client/webclient.
No error message shows up on the run batch file when the client crashes, and nothing comes up on the web client.
